meanings.definition: The act of the earth setting below the horizon.
meanings.sent1: Every evening, we watch the earthsets from our backyard.
meanings.sent2: The earthsets are always so beautiful to see.
meanings.sent3: During the earthsets, the sky turns into a canvas of colors.
meanings.sent4: The earthsets like a giant fireball disappearing into the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The earthsets create a peaceful atmosphere as night falls.

meanings.definition: The time of day when the earth sets.
meanings.sent1: I love the earthsets in the evening when the sky turns orange.
meanings.sent2: The earthsets mark the end of another day.
meanings.sent3: The earthsets signal it's time to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent4: As the earthsets, the world seems to slow down.
meanings.sent5: Watching the earthsets is a daily ritual for many people.

meanings.definition: The phenomenon of the earth appearing to sink below the horizon.
meanings.sent1: The earthsets always make me feel small in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent2: During the earthsets, the world seems to stand still.
meanings.sent3: The earthsets can sometimes make you feel like you're on a spinning ball.
meanings.sent4: The earthsets remind us of the earth's constant motion.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the earthsets is a humbling experience.
